meanings.definition: To heat again after initial heating.
meanings.sent1: After cooking the soup, she postheats it to make sure it's piping hot.
meanings.sent2: He always postheats his coffee in the microwave before drinking it.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally postheats the dessert twice, making it extra warm!
meanings.sent4: Her anger postheats slowly until it reaches boiling point.
meanings.sent5: The sun postheats the sand, making it too hot to walk on barefoot.

meanings.sent1: The postheats of the leftovers made them taste fresh again.
meanings.sent2: She used the postheats feature on the microwave to warm up her dinner.
meanings.sent3: The postheats of the pizza made it taste even better than before!
meanings.sent4: The postheats of the sun on the pavement made it warm to the touch.
meanings.sent5: The postheats of the fire kept the room cozy during the winter.
